nodes.bodyText:
Thanks so much for your contribution @dtenenba !
It might be nice to handle one more corner case here. It is possible the db_host does not contain a port (the : part). Could you maybe separate this out to a variable $db_port that's set to 3306 in case localhost does not contain :?

The localdb test might actually be failing correctly in this case, because the test doesn't have a : in the hostname: https://github.com/cBioPortal/cbioportal-frontend/blob/master/end-to-end-test/local/runtime-config/portal.properties#L5. There are two or so tests in the localdb test suite that are failing in the master branch, so those can be ignored
